nodes.text: The Mission to Orto Plutonia was a series of assignments undertaken by clone trooper Denal on the frozen world of Orto Plutonia.

After Republic received a distress call from a Jedi, who had been surrounded by droids, Denal was sent to assist. His squad landed on the planet and took out all of the hostiles. Denal then escorted the Jedi to the LAAT/i, which was sent to evacuate them. Once there they met Ahsoka Tano, Padawan of General Anakin Skywalker, who had been sent by her master to help.

Denal later participated in two more missions on the planet. The first one involved the recovery of a Republic shipment, lost after the droid attack. By installing several scanners, Denal was able to locate it. He also secured the perimeter to allow a Republic ship to pick up the cargo. After seeing so many droids on a planet that was supposed to be deserted, Denal also decided to download the droid logs from a nearby communication console.

The objective of the other mission was to locate a missing LAAT/i and its crew, that were lost after they ran into a droid force undetected by Republic radar. Denal soon found the missing LAAT/i. Hoping to find out more about these droids that could not be detected, Denal deactivated the four transmitters that controlled the droids, and then destroyed all enemies
